definition: Tang and Song dynasty provincial governor, in Tang times having military and civil authority, but only civil authority in Song

sentences.english: For this function, he was awarded the Xuanwu Jiedushi title.
sentences.chinese: 这一职能，他被授予宣武节度使冠军。

definition: provincial governor (old)

governor of a province
